name: Fall and Fade
description:
(My second game)

Jumping causes platforms to lose their energy. Once a platform has lost enough energy. it will fade, you must throw orbs at faded platforms for them to regain their energy so you can reach the exit

Controls

A/D: Movement

Space: Jump/ Double jump

Shift: Pick up orb

Control: Throw orb

R: Restart level

Space: Progress onto next level

Tab: Return to main men
